experience.title: Summer Research Student
experience.description: â€¢ Researched on the thermodynamic analysis of Molecular Beam Epitaxial Growth of 10 semi-conductors â€¢ Employed the Thermo-calc software, to study the equilibrium of the 7 reactions involved in the process â€¢ Analyzed two thermodynamic models, chemical potential model and equilibrium based model â€¢ Calculated a normalized growth rate of 0.923 at 873K for GaAs semi-conductor using these models

experience.title: Coordinator
experience.description: E-Summit is the flagship event of E-Cell, IIT Roorkee. This entrepreneurial fest aims to foster the zeal of entrepreneurship among the students of IIT Roorkee and other colleges by including competitions, Business Conclaves, Panel Discussions and many more events aimed at developing an entrepreneurial aptitude among the participants.
